questions.question: 1. What is pharmacodynamics?
choices: a) It is the production of drugs as per the safety rules
b) It is the study of how a dug affects an organism
c) It refers to compounds manufactured for use as a medicinal drug
d) It is the term for using medication to treat a disease
questions.rational: Leave the work area, using a designated escape route as you should first move towards to a safe area in the case of a fire.

questions.question: 2. The Thalidomide disaster was a drug marketed for cold medication.
questions.rational: A source of ignition, oxygen and fuel is needed to start a fire.
